title: Drawing, "Project for a sedan chair", 1780–1800
medium: Pen and ink, brush and gray, green yellow blue watercolors on paper
markings: water mark: Similar to Churchill 434, left
creditline: Gift of Mrs. Charles B. Alexander
description: Shown from the rear right corner with two bars.  Urns stand upon, tassels hang from the corners of the roof.  Garlands frame the back and the lateral side, except above and below the window.  Horizontally disposed twigs divide these panels in the height below the lower window frame.  The monogram A R is above them at the back.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Project for a sedan chair", 1780–1800.
1780–1800. Pen and ink, brush and gray, green yellow blue watercolors on paper. Gift of Mrs. Charles B. Alexander. 1900-1-20.
